ObjectClass.Name: Housecarl Medium Tank
ObjectClass.Description: HOUSECARL MEDIUM TANK: Front line heavy armor, takes fire for other units Carries up to 2 troops Can be upgraded to a HEAVY TANK Upgrading improves anti-air capability

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 4.5, MaxInc: 30\Vision Range: 25, Aggro Radius: 25

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \Reduced DPS when Energy is empty \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 200 (-150), R 15, Sta C\Air: 70 (-35), R 15, Sta C

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\ \Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires Gate Tech\ upgrade at your Achron MFB

ObjectClass.Name: Medium Tank (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This Medium Tank is destroyed Beware of internal explosions
Duration: 90 s Explosive for 50 s, 360 damage
